title: MBMBaM 531: Mighty Morphin’ Grown-Up Power Rangers
description:
Not now, Zordon. Christ, every time you come around here, we’re supposed to drop everything and mount up? Like, we know Rita Repulsa and her gooey guys are causing trouble, but we’ve got a PTA meeting this afternoon that we absolutely cannot miss.

Suggested talking points: Okay Week, It’s a Wonderful Keys, Go Go Grown-Up Rangers, Firefighter Food Faux Pas, KFCharcuterie, Charlotte’s Decorative Gourd

Ways to support Black Lives Matter and find anti-racism resources: https://linktr.ee/blacklivesmatter

Register to vote: https://vote.gov/
author: shows@mbmbam.com (Justin McElroy, Griffin McElroy, Travis McElroy)
